sql_datasource.query: SELECT nu_int AS "Code", code_techn, da_ap, he_ap, da_fin, he_fin, int_statut, observ, observ2 FROM en_cours WHERE da_ap >= '2018-01-01' AND int_cm = 'BIOMEDICAL' UNION SELECT nu_int AS "Code", code_techn, da_ap, he_ap, da_fin, he_fin, int_statut, observ, observ2 FROM b_ft1996 WHERE da_ap >= '2018-01-01' AND int_cm = 'BIOMEDICAL' ORDER BY "Code" DESC;
